variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependent_to.name: xeus
dependent_to.description: QuantStack C++ implementation of Jupyter kernel protocol

dependent_to.name: xwidgets
dependent_to.description: A C++ backend for Jupyter interactive widgets

dependent_to.name: fenics-dolfinx
dependent_to.description: Next generation FEniCS problem solving environment

dependent_to.name: xtensor-python
dependent_to.description: Python bindings for the xtensor C++ multi-dimensional array library

dependent_to.name: xtensor
dependent_to.description: Multi-dimensional arrays with broadcasting and lazy computing

dependent_to.name: fenics-basix
dependent_to.description: Basix is a finite element definition and tabulation runtime library
